title: How to Obtain String in Minecraft

steps.title: Find a spider and kill it.
steps.content: Find a spider and kill it. It has a random chance to drop anywhere from zero to two pieces of string. [1] X Research source Don't forget that spiders are able to climb walls. Spiders are neutral during the daytime. They will remain passive unless attacked by a player, causing them to turn hostile.

steps.title: Search for dungeons when mining.
steps.content: Search for dungeons when mining. In the dungeons, there will be up to two chests that contain various rare items, such as string. [2] X Research source Almost any chest can yield string, so don't just focus on dungeons.

steps.title: Keep an eye out for cobwebs and tripwire when exploring the map.
steps.content: Keep an eye out for cobwebs and tripwire when exploring the map. You can find cobwebs in strongholds and abandoned mineshafts, and you can find tripwire in jungle biomes. [3] X Research source
